column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Mako says : " I do n't understand why we 're not talking to that guard right now .
#Text=" Mako says : " That guard is only eighteen years old and has lived in Zaofu his entire life .
#Text=Zaheer and his gang have been in prison for more than thirteen years .
#Text=" Korra says : " I do n't know , but we all saw the evidence .
#Text=It 's pretty overwhelming .
#Text=" Varrick says : " Maybe a little too overwhelming ?
#Text=" Bolin says : " Hey , Varrick .
#Text=What are you doing here ?
#Text=" Varrick says : " Collecting pumice stones with Zhu Li .
#Text=That lavabender did a lot of damage , but he makes a nice exfoliating rock , and when you got callouses like mine , you take all the pumice stones you can get your hands on .
#Text=Or in my case , feet .
#Text=" Mako says : " What were you saying about the evidence ?
#Text=" Varrick says : " I was saying that I can smell a conspiracy when I see one .
#Text=Look , if I was trying to set someone up , I would tell everyone he 's guilty and then plant the evidence in his apartment as proof .
#Text=" Mako says : " Oh , you mean exactly like what you did to me ?
#Text=" Varrick says : " Yes , just like that !
#Text=Remember how great that worked ?
#Text=Well , not for you .
#Text=" Mako says : " You 're right .
#Text=All the evidence points to this guard , but maybe he 's just the fallback .
#Text=" Bolin says : " But for who ?
#Text=" Mako says : " For the only person who can truly keep a secret in this city : Aiwei .
#Text="
